Posts.Content: jackel wrote: Has anyone had Oncoplastic surgery or Oncoplastic Reduction with lumpectomy to get larger margins and a better cosmetic outcome? Looking for experiences-the good the bad and the ugly! Dx 2/2013, ILC, Left, 6cm+, Stage IV, metastasized to bone, Grade 2, 1/1 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- (IHC) Log in to post a reply
